text: ovunata pera siti nuh, ad ha samudge janayage da ibrahimge janaya, madyan vasihu ha udu yatikuru va perala dæmuvange da puvata ovun veta nopæminiye da? ovunge dutayo ovun veta pæhædili sadhaka samanga pæminiyoya. ebævin ovunata aparadhayak kirima allahta noviya. namut ovuhu tamantama aparadha kara gannan vuha
